summary: A Simple Method to Disable Console
descriptionHtml: Hello Everyone! I have been looking since launch on a easy way to disable console. This is still a very BASIC way of doing it. I used Key Helper (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=88#content) to disable all the possibilities of ~ in the game so it is no longer possible to bring up the menu. If you are like me and have little self control when playing , This is great =)
author: spikes210
